languages.text: {n}Ульфар снимает с пояса рог, вырванный им у хелбрута. Вы замечаете, что он уже весь изрезан фенрисийскими рунами. Волк гордо показывает трофей товарищам, вызывая новый взрыв радостных криков.{/n}

{n}Ulfar removes the horn he wrenched from the Helbrute from his belt, and you notice that it is already carved with Fenrisian runes. The Wolf proudly shows the trophy to his comrades, causing another explosion of cheers.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Ульфар снимает с пояса рог, вырванный им у хелбрута. Вы замечаете, что он уже весь изрезан фенрисийскими рунами. Волк гордо показывает трофей товарищам, вызывая новый взрыв радостных криков.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Ulfar removes the horn he wrenched from the Helbrute from his belt, and you notice that it is already carved with Fenrisian runes. The Wolf proudly shows the trophy to his comrades, causing another explosion of cheers.{/n}
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: {n}Ulfar se quita el cuerno que arrancó del Bruto Infernal del cinturón y ves que ya tiene talladas runas fenrisianas. El Lobo, orgulloso, enseña su trofeo a sus camaradas entre más vítores.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Ulfar removes the horn he wrenched from the Helbrute from his belt, and you notice that it is already carved with Fenrisian runes. The Wolf proudly shows the trophy to his comrades, causing another explosion of cheers.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Ulfar se quita el cuerno que arrancó del Bruto Infernal del cinturón y ves que ya tiene talladas runas fenrisianas. El Lobo, orgulloso, enseña su trofeo a sus camaradas entre más vítores.{/n}
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: {n}乌尔法从腰带上取下了他用地狱兽的角做成的角杯，你发现上面已经刻满了芬里斯符文。乌尔法自豪地向他的战友们展示战利品，又引起了一阵欢呼。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Ulfar removes the horn he wrenched from the Helbrute from his belt, and you notice that it is already carved with Fenrisian runes. The Wolf proudly shows the trophy to his comrades, causing another explosion of cheers.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}乌尔法从腰带上取下了他用地狱兽的角做成的角杯，你发现上面已经刻满了芬里斯符文。乌尔法自豪地向他的战友们展示战利品，又引起了一阵欢呼。{/n}
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: {n}ウルファーはヘルブルートからもぎ取った角をベルトから外すと、すでにフェンリスのルーンが刻まれていのが見える。ウルフが誇らしげに戦利品を仲間に見せると、再び歓声が上がる。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Ulfar removes the horn he wrenched from the Helbrute from his belt, and you notice that it is already carved with Fenrisian runes. The Wolf proudly shows the trophy to his comrades, causing another explosion of cheers.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}ウルファーはヘルブルートからもぎ取った角をベルトから外すと、すでにフェンリスのルーンが刻まれていのが見える。ウルフが誇らしげに戦利品を仲間に見せると、再び歓声が上がる。{/n}
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: {n}Ulfar détache de sa ceinture la corne arrachée au Métabrutus et vous remarquez qu'elle est déjà gravée de runes fenrisiennes. Le Wolf brandit fièrement son trophée devant ses camarades, ce qui donne lieu à un nouveau concert d'acclamations.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Ulfar removes the horn he wrenched from the Helbrute from his belt, and you notice that it is already carved with Fenrisian runes. The Wolf proudly shows the trophy to his comrades, causing another explosion of cheers.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Ulfar détache de sa ceinture la corne arrachée au Métabrutus et vous remarquez qu'elle est déjà gravée de runes fenrisiennes. Le Wolf brandit fièrement son trophée devant ses camarades, ce qui donne lieu à un nouveau concert d'acclamations.{/n}
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: {n}Ulfar zieht das Horn, das er dem Höllenschlächter entrissen hat, aus seinem Gürtel. Du bemerkst, dass bereits fenrisische Runen darin eingraviert sind. Der Wolf zeigt die Trophäe stolz seinen Kameraden, was eine weitere Jubelwelle auslöst.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Ulfar removes the horn he wrenched from the Helbrute from his belt, and you notice that it is already carved with Fenrisian runes. The Wolf proudly shows the trophy to his comrades, causing another explosion of cheers.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Ulfar zieht das Horn, das er dem Höllenschlächter entrissen hat, aus seinem Gürtel. Du bemerkst, dass bereits fenrisische Runen darin eingraviert sind. Der Wolf zeigt die Trophäe stolz seinen Kameraden, was eine weitere Jubelwelle auslöst.{/n}
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: {n}Ulfar, Tamu Kaçkını'ndan aldığı boynuzu kemerinden çıkarıyor. Boynuzu Fenris rünleriyle kaplı olduğunu fark ediyorsun. Kurt, ganimetini kardeşlerine gösterdiğinde bir tezahürat daha kopuyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Ulfar removes the horn he wrenched from the Helbrute from his belt, and you notice that it is already carved with Fenrisian runes. The Wolf proudly shows the trophy to his comrades, causing another explosion of cheers.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Ulfar, Şuursuz'dan aldığı boynuzu kemerinden çıkarıyor, Fenris rünleriyle kaplı olduğunu fark ediyorsun. Kurt, ganimetini kardeşlerine gösterdiğinde bir tezahürat daha kopuyor.{/n}
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion
